title: Provides for an additional judge of the county court for the county of Cayuga who shall discharge duties of county court judge, family court judge and surrogate
summary: Provides for an additional judge of the county court for the county of Cayuga who shall discharge duties of county court judge, family court judge and surrogate.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         3893

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                   January 28, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by  M.  of A. FINCH, KOLB, KATZ -- read once and referred to
         the Committee on Judiciary

       AN ACT to amend the judiciary law, in relation to establishing a  second
         county court judgeship in the county of Cayuga

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. Subdivision 5 of section 182 of the judiciary law, as added
    2  by chapter 699 of the laws of 1969, is amended to read as follows:
    3    5. Cayuga, [one] TWO;
    4    S 2. An additional office of judge of the county court of  the  county
    5  of  Cayuga  is  hereby  established. Each person holding such additional
    6  office shall also act as and discharge the duties of county court judge,
    7  judge of the family court and surrogate of such county.
    8    S 3. This act shall take effect immediately; provided,  however,  that
    9  the  additional  office  of county judge established pursuant to section
   10  one of this act shall first be  filled  at  the  general  election  next
   11  succeeding  the  effective  date of this act and shall first take office
   12  the first of January next succeeding the general election.





        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD03812-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the judiciary law, in relation to establishing a second county court judgeship in the county of Cayuga
